mapper.update: update rp_report set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, summary, create_date, create_userid, remark from rp_report
